title: Who Doesn't Like Banana Notes in Bourbon? Country Star Dillon Carmichael
itunes:title: Who Doesn't Like Banana Notes in Bourbon? Country Star Dillon Carmichael
description:
On this week's show, Fred Minnick pulls one out from the vault. Interviewed in 2019 at Hometown Rising Country Music Festival, Dillon Carmichael's the nephew of John Michael Montgomery and has carved out his own country music fame. 

A native of Kentucky and with his traditional country flare, Dillon is the next wave of Bluegrass roots tearing up Nashville. His latest album, Son of A, is out now.

Sponsors

Heaven Hill Brands

Michter's

291 Colorado Whiskey
